scripts.electron:dev: node tools/setup-dev-mpv.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run prepare:mpv && npm run build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.cjs
scripts.mobile:build: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.mobile:run: npm run mobile:build && npx cap run android
scripts.tv:sync: npm run tv:build && npx cap sync --config capacitor-tv.config.json
scripts.tv:run: npm run tv:build && npx cap run android --config capacitor-tv.config.json
scripts.build:webos: npm run build:tv && echo 'WebOS build completed in dist-tv/webos/'
scripts.build:netcast: npm run build:tv && echo 'NetCast build completed in dist-tv/netcast/'
scripts.build:tizen: npm run build:tv && echo 'Tizen build completed in dist-tv/tizen/'
scripts.build:smarttv: npm run build:tv && echo 'Smart TV builds completed in dist-tv/'
